options.name: items
options.description: List of items which should be displayed inside drop-down list.

options.name: display-property
options.description: Property which should be used for displaying item information

options.name: value-property
options.description: Property which is for binding to items list.

options.name: ng-disabled
options.description: Whether the component should be disabled or not.

options.name: maxlength
options.description: Maximum number of characters can be entered into search box.

options.name: separator
options.description: Character which is used for joining selected items.

options.name: auto-close
options.description: Whether drop-down menu should be closed when an item is selected or not.

options.name: limit-item-amount
options.description: Maximum number of items which can be selected.

options.name: is-clear-button-available
options.description: Whether clear button should be displayed or not.
